alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued March 30 at 10:17AM CDT until April 04 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in La Crosse WI has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Black River at Black River Falls affecting Jackson County. Black River Near Galesville affecting Trempealeau and La Crosse zones. Yellow River at Necedah affecting Juneau County. ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING TO EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding is likely. * WHERE...Black River at Black River Falls. * WHEN...From Saturday morning to early Tuesday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 40.7 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage is expected to be reached this weekend based on the latest forecast information. - Flood stage is 47.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse. The next statement will be issued this evening by 10 PM CDT.
